snippet: A veteran, freelance war photographer and creative writing teacher finds a way, through the experience of another soldier, to recognize, but not single out, the students in his class who have served.
abstract: A veteran, freelance war photographer and creative writing teacher finds a way, through the experience of another soldier, to recognize, but not single out, the students in his class who have served.

headline.main: For a New Teacher, a Soldier's Lessons on Helping Veterans Fit In
